summary: A husband and wife open a video store in a new town, and come to find out that the locals only rent horror films and the "occasional triple X'er", and make their own snuff videos.
cast: Gary Schwartz|Chick Kaplan|Robin Leeds|Paige Price|Kevin Haver|Art Neill|Bill Biach|Uke|Bart Sumner|Joseph Kordos|Chris Williams|William Toddie|Jackie Neill|Ricky Kotch|Jennifer Biach|Bonnie Schedin|Madison Schedin|Judy Seplowin|Karen Oujo|Linda Herman|Cara Biach|Joann Poll|O. Selig Stokes|Susan Speidel|Marci Garfinkel|Jerry Kopf|Christa Somma|Susan Stern|Mike Yonone|Barbara Brunnquell|Bob Brunnquell|Richard 'Dick' Haig|Ray Clark|Ellen Dreyer|Lori Andres|David Christopher|Richard Johnson|Lisa Cohen|Paul Kaye
director: Director: Gary P. Cohen (as Gary R. Cohen)
title: Video Violence
